root.name: Bomb Monkey
root.description: OverviewBomb Monkey is a puzzle game released on the 3DS eShop by Renegade Kid, that has gameplay similar to Wario's Woods and Super Puzzle Fighter.It features multiplayer versus and coop modes that have two players share one 3DS unit and use it in book mode with the game scrolling in opposite directions. It will launch at a $4.99 price point.
